content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace Smelting Setup at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) that processes ores.
• Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) transferring output from the furnace.
• Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -84.5) storing processed items.
• Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -81.5) serving as additional storage.

### Lab Setup at position (45.5, -79.5)
Consists of:
• Lab at position (45.5, -79.5) receiving automation science packs, engaged in automation research.

### Boiler and Steam Engine Production Setup
Consists of:
• Boiler at position (42.5, -79.0) fueled with wood, intended for steam production but flagged with warnings (no input liquid, no fluid present in connections). It has connection points at positions (40.5, -78.5) and (44.5, -78.5) and a steam output point at (42.5, -81.0).
• Steam Engine crafted and present in inventory. An attempted placement of a steam engine at position (44.0, -79.5) failed due to an obstruction at the target location.

ERROR TIPS
• Insufficient sub-ingredients for crafting – Repeated failures in crafting automation science packs and steam engines stem from missing sub-ingredients (iron-plate and iron-gear-wheel). Ensure adequate supply of necessary intermediate products and that the smelting or crafting facilities are properly configured.
• Incorrect placement locations – The error encountered when attempting to place a steam engine indicates target tile obstruction. Validate that the target location is free of other entities before placement.
• Handling inventory and placement mismatches – Continue to double-check inventory contents and the availability of required items before initiating insertions or placements, as seen with multiple extraction and insertion operations requiring precision.
